National Commercial Bank Limited, nke a maara dị ka NCB, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ego nke dị na Mauritius na isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Port Louis. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa nyere ikike nke Bank of Mauritius, ụlọ akụ etiti obodo na onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke mba ahụ.
E debanyere aha National Commercial Bank Limited na Thursday April 9, 2015 ma nye ya ikikere ụlọ akụ azụmahịa site na Bank of Mauritius na Friday April 10, 2015

National Commercial Bank nwetara akụ na ụgwọ ụfọdụ nke Bramer Banking Corporation ugbu a. Nke a bụ mgbe ụlọ akụ nke Mauritius wepụrụ ikike ụlọ akụ nke Bramer Banking Corporation na-esote nsogbu ego na ụlọ akụ ahụ. E mere mbufe akaụntụ akụ na ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ Bramer mbụ na NCB na Satọde Eprel 11, 2015..
Na Mọnde Jenụwarị 4, 2016, NCB jikọtara na steeti Mauritius Post na ụlọ ọrụ nkwado iji guzobe Bank Mauritius (MauBank). Ụlọ akụ ahụ e guzobere ọhụrụ natara ikikere ụlọ akụ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ.
National Commercial Bank bụ nke Gọọmentị Mauritius.
